nodes.text: A Unidentified Republic commodore was the Republic command officer of the Republic assault on Korriban during the Great Galactic War, a conflict with the reconstituted Sith Empire, alongside the Jedi Master Jerbhen Hulis. She guided the fleet meantime the Jedi commanded the grounds forces. She had well utilized informations passed by the rogue Sith Exal Kressh to take advantage of the Imperial Navy's rotation schedule for patrol vessels. The commodore also managed to get her ships past the Empire's ion mine field that surrounded Korriban, allowing for the release of several drop-ships; these vessels carried Republic soldiers and Jedi Knights bound for the surface of the world, where they would attempt to seize the academy and rendezvouz with Kressh within.
